ADNIMERGE2

This is an R data package for the Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) study. All datasets are included as shared on https://adni.loni.usc.edu/.

Package Access

The ADNI study R data package, ADNIMERGE2, will be available on the data sharing platform at LONI website. To request access of the R package, it is required to submit an online application via LONI website and acceptance of the ADNI Data Use Agreement here.

Installation

To install the package locally, run install.packages("path/to/ADNIMERGE2_0.1.1.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type = "source").

Usage

Learn more about ADNIMERGE2 at Get Started page
